reviews.sentence: Not bad clean. Rooms are decent staff is very helpful. One important caution If you expect to sleep at night do not take a room on the side facing the Interstate. Between that and Baseline Road the noise is deafening. Ask for the side facing the Home Depot or the courtyard. The Wi Fi can be spotty there but sleep is more important.

Great Stay. Room was beautiful with microwave fridge and sitting room area. We booked early and got a great price. Breakfast was okay lots of options but hot food was not very hot. Staff was friendly and gave great information. Would stay there again in a heartbeat. Cleanliness location and price. Great location for MLB Spring Training. Shopping nearby though we did not shop. Hot items in the breakfast area.

Hotel is what you had expect. the staff is not. The Tempe Holiday Inn Express is pretty much what you had expect from a HIX comfortable clean room. typical free breakfast. although the pancake maker spit out some pretty tasty pancakes convenient location and plenty of parking thanks to the Arizona Mills Mall which is right there. What got this hotel five stars from me is the staff. They were great very friendly and helpful. From delicious cookies at check in to a super smooth and quick check out. Our smoke alarm started chirping around midnight and I was sure we would have to wait for maintenance to come change the battery. Nope. Within a couple of minutes the amazingly nice woman working the front desk came up herself with batteries in hand. She changed out the batteries waited and pleasantly chatted for a few minutes to make sure everything was ok. She apologized and bid us a good night. I wish I had gotten her name so I could let the hotel know. hopefully they will read my review and know who I am talking about. Anyway Fantastic customer service is alive and well at this Holiday Inn ExpresYes. there was a little renovation going on. but they are just keeping the hotel in good shape.
It was close to great shopping and eateries. The staff was professional and friendly. The room size was adequate for us. Location was great Centrally located to shops and food. Carpet needs updating.
Business Trip. We stayed here on our business trip for a couple of days. The staff was great the hotel was clean and the breakfast was yummy. The pool was not very clean but the hot tub was nice.
Very clean nice staff. When a c broke they moved me no issues.

Great Location Really. While attending a large event at the Arizona Grand where I was n’t able to get a room the HI Express was a convenient and comfortable base. The hotel is within easy walking distance to the shopping and dining mall across the carpark and situated beside a selection of restaurants. It is a 5 minute drive to rhe Arizona Grand. We checked in after a 6 hour drive and found fresh baked cookies waiting for us at the reception desk. Across the foyer was a coffee and tea station available 247. what hospitality. Breakfast each morning was limited in choice but tasted quite good. We found the room to be clean and the beds comfortable. The staff were all very acomodating and kind and we would definitely stay here again.
Very friendly staff pretty rooms very clean.
Love this hotel. Great location and the staff is amazing. Also it has truck parking.

Worse customer service do not stay here. The good reviews must be from family and employees this place is horrible. Our first room had no running water in bathroom sink and the carpet was soak. They had a big hole in the wall that was just recently patched so I assumed there was a leak. Why would they give this room to anyone. The girl at the front desk said she would give me extra towels to throw on the floor and we can use the bar sink by the desk to brush our teeth. No discount offered. I requested another room. After making myself and another customer stand there for 15 mins they somehow pulled a room out of their hat when they said they had none. We changed rooms and noticed an awful foul odor how the carpet had rolls in it. But we had running water so we were ok with it. Next day we noticed the AC was not working. It was 104 outside. We asked for a fan and was told no they do n’t have any. By now I did n’t believe anything she said. They again said there was no other rooms. We left at 10 pm because it was too hot to sleep. I paid for a room at another hotel. Holiday inn refused to give a refund for my second night there. Horrible rude people.

If you read my reviews for Econo Lodge Sky Harbor Airport and Hotel Del Sol Sky Harbor area as well then you will understand why we were so relieved to get here and stay at Holiday Inn Express. While it was not in the area we needed it was unfortunately the closest to the airport that was still available late in the evening prior to our morning flight. Despite everything the employees here were incredibly friendly welcoming and supportive. They got us a room set up quickly and the entire experience was lovely. It was one of the cleanest hotels we have ever stayed in and the room was massive and beautiful. we have stayed in Holiday Inn Express locations elsewhere before but this location was the nicest by far that we have seen. We were not looking for anything more than a clean safe room bed for the night but the extras here were great for while we were here to enjoy it. The business center came in handy since we are in the middle of a move the breakfast was actually pretty good with lots of options and housekeeping was absolutely wonderful too. Thanks for everything.

Bad shape not worth what you pay for. Hotel room in terrible shape. Not only visible signs of wear and lack of maintenance but also the room gave a sense of being dirty. The old dark decoration hides many stains. I do not believe that I have stayed at a Holiday Inn in such bad shape before and I have stayed in many. For the rate that I paid I am very disappointing. I can only put in a good work for the gentleman at the front desk who was very kind when checking me in.

The assistant general manager Mr King is the only reason this place is still standing and getting business in my opinion. The staff would not be as friendly and helpful if it was not for him being in charge he is the inspiration that keeps them all going.

A Wonderful Place To Stay 1. The room was HUGE and clean2. The breakfast was most excelent3. The staff was very accommodating and friendly4. Parking availability is excelent5. Arizona Mills mall is literally across the stret6. Plenty of places to eat in the immediate area around the hotel not counting the mall food court7. Oh yeah they have these DELICIOUS cookies at the front desk that they strongly suggest you try. The second floor of the hotel was going through renovations so there were signs of construction which caused a bit of a mess. Although I suppose that is unavoidable in that situation.

Outstanding Stay at Holiday Inn Express in Tempe Arizona. This property has been redecorated recently and is a delightful oasis in Tempe. Rooms are spacious and well appointed comfortable and quiet. Public areas are well decorated. can not say enough good about this property. Jacqueline was very helpful and professional. Other staffers were nice too.
nothing was unique. Staff was nice though and I got a free water.
it is my second home I love this place especially the staff. The remodel is great and it is within walking distance to good food and drink places.
Great place to stay. Big rooms large clean bathroom. Price was decent. Good restaurants nearby. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Would definitely stay here again.
Exceptional. Everything the staff was great and very helpful. Nothing everything was great no bad experiancest.

Remodel is amazing. The new remodel is amazing. I love the color and especially the pillows. Jacqueline was great too no problem is too small or too big or an inconvenience. She smiles more than anyone I know and always has a kind word. do not miss this hotel and know the staff will take great care of you.
I have stayed here several times and I will continue to stay here as long as I continue to have a great experience. The staff is friendly the breakfast always warm and the beds are. very comfortable.

Convenient location clean friendly staff. Room was spotless and room attendants were helpful. Hotel is located within close walking distance of a CVS outlet mall claim jumper mc Donald ’s and Carl ’s junior. Check in staff was friendly. The breakfast area was small but ample for the hotel size.

Convenient location clean friendly staff. Room was spotless and room attendants were helpful. Hotel is located within close walking distance of a CVS outlet mall claim jumper mc Donald ’s and Carl ’s junior. Check in staff was friendly. The breakfast area was small but ample for the hotel size.

Rooms were clean nice and comfortable. Nice people at the front desk and staff are hard working and nice. Like this place for spring training to stay. Great Breakfast in the morning. Pancake machine is awesome.
Nice and roomy rooms. Staff and breakfast were great. Slept great and the location was great. There were gas stations restaurants and stores near by.
